name: uncomic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not funny: He's a comic character involved in very uncomic deeds.
More examplesFewer examplesIn the same roles in the musical, the duo are scarily uncomic.His character is just charming enough to hold this lightly uncomic film together. Better known for her comedy, she describes getting inside the soul of an altogether uncomic character as a dark pleasure.To many of us, his examples seem distinctly uncomic, dull, and flat.The London diocese was dotted with rebel or eccentric clergymen, comic and uncomic.
